description:
Backed by well over 4 decades of experience, our Hawaii personal injury attorneys at Leavitt, Yamane & Soldner are dedicated to serving their clients with honest, compassionate, and aggressive representation to obtain the most positive results possible. No matter what case a client may bring, our relentless lawyers have what it takes to pursue maximum compensation. When you choose to work with our team, we promise to let you focus on the road to recovery while we stand up for your rights inside and outside the courtroom.

Over the years, each attorney on our team has acquired the necessary successes and experience that allows our clients to entrust them with their cases from beginning to end. Throughout every case, we do our best to inform our clients of every element as each case unfolds. When you need an experienced team to stand up and fight for your rights as an accident victim, we encourage you to contact our Hawaii personal injury lawyers at Leavitt, Yamane & Soldner immediately. We have been proudly serving the Hawaiian Islands since 1971.
